subject: Re: Two in a row--box not responding!
author: Steve Hultay
full_text:
At the beginning of file in the first 2 seconds they say "He Can 
Move the Crystal", 6 seconds in it says "Don't argue with Steve", 15 
seconds in i hear "Here" and at 16 seconds in they say "I Love 
Purple".  19 seconds in it says "Heartbeat Here---Kevin is it".  The 
rest i believe is radio.

-Steve H.


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <franks-boxes@...> 
wrote:
>
> 
> Hi all;  Well it happened again--first #24 would not work wiht 
when we were trying to get a K2 meter response the weekend before 
last. then Monday night the same thing happened wiht someone else. I 
took the box back to the work bench, and it works fine!  Our dingbat 
daughter in-law gave us a 'rescue' poodle a couple weeks ago, which 
was fine, and a cute little dog. Last ngith she fell off the bed and 
broke leg! The segment talks about that, from #24. I left it long 
cuz there's some other voices in it, like Bob Houston, a guide I 
think as he frequently comes through. It's interesting to doa google 
on 'Bob Houston'.     Frank
